summary: Internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, where the C-20 Squad (VCACIHT) requests assistance from other agents for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The email frames it as a unique opportunity to work on a high-profile case.

events.title: FBI Request for Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Case
events.description: The FBI's C-20 Squad (VCACIHT) sends out an internal request for assistance from other agents for the ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The FBI's C-20 Squad, also referred to as VCACIHT, was actively seeking assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 29, 2020.
The investigation was described as an ongoing, high-profile case, indicating significant activity years after Epstein's arrest and death.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination and resource allocation for the case, with agents needing to coordinate time with their squad supervisors (SSA).
